title: Change Name on a Ticket
description: A passenger booked a flight but made a typo in their last name. They need to correct it to match their ID.

tasks.description: Retrieve the booking and identify the name discrepancy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the booking and confirms the name needs correction.

tasks.description: Check the airline's policy and any applicable fees for minor name corrections.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that minor corrections are allowed for a small fee.

tasks.description: Process the name correction, collect the fee, and reissue the ticket.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully corrects the name on the ticket and issues an updated confirmation.
